string-array.name: grounding_phrases
string-array.item: Forgiveness will never change your past but it could very well change your future.
I am safe in this moment.
I am strong enough to handle this.
I trust myself to make the right decision.
I am in control of my thoughts and emotions.
Everything is going to be okay.
Life is full of challenges, and I can handle them.
The universe is conspiring to help me, even if I can\'t see it yet.
